original_title: Suong Mu Tren Dinh Nui, Bao to Noi Dong Bang
overview: On the land, a zone of hard labor, a friendship is born between two men, a Vietnamese farmer and a Western painter who do not understand each other's language. Every year,  storm and inundation devastate everything, the farmer informs his friend about the death of his father... Meanwhile, on the mountain, the park of attraction continues to entice people in the fog...
title: Fog Over the Summit and Storm Over the Plain
